fields.name: Ordinary Citizen:
fields.value: Set your Attack Power and Defense Power to the median amount currently in the game.

fields.name: Ballot Box (Charge, 70%):
fields.value: The next day, Day Voting is anonymous.

fields.name: Scrutiny (Charge, 100%):
fields.value: View every vote of a chosen evening phase. The votes will still be anonymous.

fields.name: Voter Fraud (1x, Locked, Charge 75%):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top half three times. Gain 3 votes the next Day Phase.

fields.name: Abstention:
fields.value: Attack someone who did not vote in either the Day or Evening phases. Abstaining during the Day Phase does not count toward the people you can attack. You can use other abilities alongside with this one.
